price: 59. Waxay yidhaahdeen: “Yaa ku falay sidan ilaahyadayada?, Kaasi waa daalime?”
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
